english.segment1: Every nation power and tongue. will bow down to your name. Every eye will see. Every ear will hear your name proclaimed
english.segment2: And this is gonna be our cry. until you come again. Jesus is the only name. By which man can be saved
english.segment3: CHORUS. All over the world people just like us. Are calling your name. Living in your love. All over the world people just like us. Are following Jesus. x2
english.segment5: We're worshipping Jesus. We're following Jesus. We're worshipping Jesus. We're calling on Jesus
english.segment6: Makes you wanna dance (echo). Makes you wanna sing (echo). Makes you wanna shout all about it. shout all about it, shout it that Jesus is king. (repeat)
